titleStmt.title: A defence of the report, concerning the present state of the differences in doctrinals, between some dissenting ministers in London, in reply to a book, enbtitled, A faithful rebuke of that report
titleStmt.author: Lobb, Stephen, d. 1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Nath. Hiller, at the Prince's Arms in Leaden-Hall-Street, over against St. Mary Axe,

notesStmt.note: Preface signed: S.L., i.e. Stephen Lobb.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Prince's Arms in Leaden-Hall-Street, over against St. Mary Axe
